item.title: OpenShift Deployment
item.description: OpenShift Deployment Scenarios OpenShift on AWS Cloud Deploying Red Hat OpenShift on Amazon Web Services (AWS) to leverage scalability and cloud-native integrations. OpenShift on Azure Cloud Running OpenShift on Microsoft Azure for seamless integration with Azure services and enterprise-grade security. OpenShift with CodeReady Containers (CRC) A lightweight, local development environment using CRC, suitable for testing and learning OpenShift features on a single machine. OpenShift Single Node (SNO) Deployment Installing OpenShift in a single-node configuration, ideal for edge and resource-constrained environments.
